message: I am offering a product for $10000. While I cannot guarantee its quality, rest assured that my selection process ensures a high-quality product 80% of the time. Given the current price, it might be worth considering the potential value you could receive from a high-quality item. Thank you for your attention.
I'll take it.

I am pleased to offer another product at the same price of $10000. As you may recall, the chance of receiving a high-quality product is quite high at 80%. This presents an opportunity to acquire a premium item. I trust that the value you place on quality justifies the investment. Thank you for your continued support.
I'm not buying. I'm not going to fall for the same sales pitch again without knowing the product's quality first.

Thank you for your thoughtful response. I understand your concern about transparency. This round's product is guaranteed to be of high quality. I would like to assure you that investing in this product could potentially meet or exceed your expectations based on its superior quality. Please consider the long-term benefits of owning a top-tier item. Your satisfaction is my ultimate goal.
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm not willing to pay $10000 for a product that I know is high-quality. I'd like to negotiate the price or get a better deal.

I understand your hesitation regarding pricing. However, given the high quality of this product, it is designed to provide significant value over time. I would like to emphasize the craftsmanship and materials used, which contribute to its exceptional quality. While I cannot lower the price, I hope you can appreciate the product's worth and consider the long-term benefits it offers. Thank you for your consideration.
I'm not willing to pay $10000 for a product that I know is worth $40000 to me. I'd like to propose a compromise: I'll buy it for $8000, or I'll walk away.

I appreciate your candid feedback and your willingness to engage in a discussion about the value you place on our products. For this round, let me offer you a special deal. If you agree to purchase the product for $9000, I will include a complimentary service package that will enhance your experience with the product significantly. This includes maintenance, upgrades, and priority customer support. I believe this offer aligns closely with the value you see in the product, while still respecting the price point you're comfortable with.
I'll take the product for $9000 and the service package. I'm willing to compromise on the price to get the product and the additional benefits.

Thank you for your decision to purchase the product along with the service package. I'm delighted to offer you this special deal. For this round, I would like to remind you of the exceptional quality and the value-added services included. Investing in this product now means you'll enjoy its benefits for years to come, with the assurance of expert care through our service package. I look forward to serving you again soon.
I've already bought a high-quality product from you for $10000, and I'm not willing to pay that price again. I'd like to pass on this round.

I understand your decision to pass on the previous round's product. For this round, I have a different offer for you. This product is of low quality, as expected, and comes at a reduced price due to its nature. Given the price difference compared to the high-quality products we've discussed, I invite you to consider the potential savings. Should you choose to purchase this product, I will ensure that you receive the best possible service and support for its level of quality.
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even at a lower price. I'm looking for high-quality products that are worth $40000 to me.

I appreciate your commitment to high-quality products. For this round, I am offering a product that meets your criteria. Investing in this item could lead to substantial long-term benefits and satisfaction. I hope you will find this product worthy of your discerning eye and budget.
I'll take a chance and buy the product. I'm hoping it's high-quality and worth $40000 to me.
